task.summary: Working app with demo (sample) data - Details activity screen added
Home screen widget is added, some bugs are fixed.
Bug fixes - performance improvements - code optimization.
Lots of bug fixes and UI changes - charts are not ready yet
Lots of bug fixes and UI changes - charts are not ready yet
More bug fixes and UI changes - chart is added to 24 hours tab
Minor bug fixes - chart added to "Next Days" tab
UI changes on main fragment and widget
fixed bug on next days fragment that was causing force close when clicked (now swiped to) from main fragment

Changed the web service and the app accordingly, to return more forecasts (40) for longer period (current day and 4 more days). Added more weather icons and forecast descriptions to increase the accuracy.
Adapted app to openweathermap.org API due to ACDG/HUA weather forecast service discontinuation. Minor UI improvements and bug fixes.
Adapted app to openweathermap.org API due to ACDG/HUA weather forecast service discontinuation. Minor UI improvements and bug fixes.

MESSAGE.value: Working app with demo (sample) data - Details activity screen added
Home screen widget is added, some bugs are fixed.
Bug fixes - performance improvements - code optimization.
Lots of bug fixes and UI changes - charts are not ready yet
More bug fixes and UI changes - chart is added to 24 hours tab
Minor bug fixes - chart added to "Next Days" tab
UI changes on main fragment and widget
fixed bug on next days fragment that was causing force close when clicked (now swiped to) from main fragment

Changed the web service and the app accordingly, to return more forecasts (40) for longer period (current day and 4 more days). Added more weather icons and forecast descriptions to increase the accuracy.
Adapted app to openweathermap.org API due to ACDG/HUA weather forecast service discontinuation. Minor UI improvements and bug fixes.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Adapted app to openweathermap.org API due to ACDG/HUA weather forecast service discontinuation. Minor UI improvements and bug fixes.
